abstract: Steve Nechelput, a British finance executive, has not been detained or prevented from traveling or working in China, but a person involved in the case says he is prohibited from leaving the country.
snippet: Steve Nechelput, a British finance executive, has not been detained or prevented from traveling or working in China, but a person involved in the case says he is prohibited from leaving the country.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — Chinese authorities have barred a British finance executive at the pharmaceutical giant GlaxoSmithKline from leaving the country while they carry out an investigation into bribery and corruption at the British company, the company confirmed on Wednesday.

headline.main: China Bars GlaxoSmithKline Executive From Leaving During a Bribery Inquiry
headline.print_headline: China Bars GlaxoSmithKline Executive From Leaving During a Bribery Inquiry
